articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: "Going Overboard": Harbhajan Singh Reacts As Sunil Gavaskar Questions 'Captain' Rohit Sharma - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Rohit Sharma has received a lot of flak from fans and former cricketers, including the legendary Sunil Gavaskar, who felt that his leadership in the World Test Championship (WTC) final against Australia was not up to the mark.
articles.content: Rohit Sharma needs all the support from the Indian cricket establishment in the coming times as people are going "overboard" with their criticism of his captaincy, feels spin great Harbhajan Singh. I… [+7383 chars]
